openGraph.ogTitle: What is Good Product Strategy? — Melissa Perri
openGraph.ogDescription:
“What is your Product Strategy? YOU NEED A STRATEGY.”
When I replay this scene in my head, I can hear the CTO very audibly yelling (slash pleading) with our product team. He was on edge. We had been experimenting towards a very concrete goal for two months, and had made a lot of progress. We had lea
This article explains how you can systematically link product strategy and execution by using the product strategy cycle.
